Sock-tionary: A sock-themed dictionary that defines various sock-related terms and concepts.
Sock-tivity: A subscription box that sends monthly sock collections to customers, each with a different theme and color scheme.
Sock-tivity App: A mobile app that helps users find and purchase new sock collections based on their preferences and budget.
Sock-tivity Game: A board game where players collect and trade socks to win prizes and points.
Sock-tivity Podcast: A podcast that features interviews with sock designers, experts, and enthusiasts, as well as reviews of new sock collections and trends.
